content: leaving a 12-inch tail using the kitchener stitch how to work a gusset heel tutorial http //tinyurl com/yakln2wj close the toe of your sock make a second sock identical to the first weave in the ends wet block and allow to dry completely rock your new socks page 2 of 3 @notsorryknitter on ravelry instagram ello & twitter | unapologeticknitter com | the unapologetic knitter on facebook & youtube cuff turn the heel work the gusset kitchener stitch using cc and preferred stretchy cast-on german twisted with ws facing continuing to knit flat on the back needle round 1 needle 1 knit to 2 sts before marker ssk sm knit to end cast-on is recommended cast on 56 64 72 sts divide the sts round 1 needle 2 knit to marker sm k2tog knit to end thread your 12-inch tail on to your tapestry needle evenly place the first 28 32 36 sts on the front needle - these row 1 ws sl 1 p14 16 18 p2tog p1 turn work will be the front/instep sts the last 28 32 36 sts will be the row 2 rs sl 1 k3 ssk k1 turn work round 2 needle 1 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm knit step 1 insert tapestry needle purlwise into first st on front back/sole sts and will be worked on the back needle row 3 sl 1 purl to 1 st before the gap p2tog across the gap p1 to end needle leave st on the front needle turn work round 2 needle 2 knit to marker sm k1 ssk knit to end german twisted cast on tutorial http //tinyurl com/j64yl3d row 4 sl 1 knit to 1 st before the gap ssk across the gap k1 step 2 insert tapestry needle knitwise into first st on back turn work round 3 needles 1 & 2 knit slipping marker as encountered needle leave st on the back needle tip use the cast-on tail to indicate beg of round until enough fabric is available to clip a removable marker to the work repeat row 3 & 4 until all the heel sts have been worked ending repeat rnds 2 & 3 until 28 32 36 sts rem on both needles step 3 insert tapestry needle knitwise into the first st on front needle and remove the st from the front needle insert with row 4 16 18 20 sts rem on back needle work in k2 p2 rib for 1½ inches redistribute sts and remove markers as encountered placing 28 tapestry needle purlwise into the next st on the front needle break cc 32 36 instep sts on the front needle and 28 32 36 sole sts on leave st on the front needle break cc the back needle pick up stitches step 4 insert tapestry needle purlwise into the first st on leg join mc instep/foot back needle and remove the st from the back needle insert join mc continuing with mc knit
